JCET MEMBERS
July 22, 1954
Ralph Steetle. Executive Director
AMERICAN COUNCIL ON EDUCATION
David D. Henry. Chairman
HUDSON 3-6628
ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION
BY RADIO-TELEVISION
Franklin Dunham
ASSOCIATION OF LAND-GRANT
COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES
James H. Denison
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF
EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Graydon Ausmus
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STATE
UNIVERSITIES
Albert N. Jorgensen
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
President, NAEB
Box 2002
NATIONAL COUNCIL OF CHIEF
STATE SCHOOL OFFICERS
Edgar Fuller, Vice-Chairman
University, Alabama
NATIONAL EDUCATION ASSOCIATION
OF THE UNITED STATES
BELMONT Farley
Dear Graydon:
Enclosed is the record of our meeting in New York
City on July 7, 1954. Our August meeting has been
set for August 18th in East Lansing. Jimmy
Denison has reserved space in the Kellogg Center.
An opportunity for inspection of WKAR-TV will be
provided. Armand Hunter will be our guest at
lunch for a discussion of station management
problems. Representatives of the Program Center
at Ann Arbor are expected to be present. It is
hoped that you will be able to remain in East
Lansing for the evening of August 18th in order
to take advantage of a dinner at the Country Club
arranged by Jimmy.
A copy of the JCET endorsement of Michigan State's
request for Channel 10 is enclosed.
Sincerely,
Ralph Steetle
Executive Director
Enclosures
